reviewText: Excellent price and fast shipping.  Thank you!

This was a gag gift for my oldest.  He loved this the first time it came out, and watched it until the tape nearly wore through.  Fun fire safety movie with music, and helpful information without being heavy handed or frightening.
I really like this video. My class loves to watch this all the time. I use it during Fire Prevention week.  We use to have it on a cd but the cd was lost.  Now I can only fine it on vdieo
Excellent for Pre-k classes.  Captured their attention for the entire video.  Fun, musical, and surprise actors/actresses! Would've good for older kids too.

My students have enjoyed this video each month since I've bought it.

Thank you for having it avsailable.

I love this video! Very retro, but very cute. I have showed this video to pre-kindergartners and 4th/5th graders. They all love it. It is silly but it gets the point of fire safety across to the students.
